item.description:
Chuck Hagenbuch - founder of Horde/IMP - will discuss the Horde Framework.

Horde is both a piece of software and a project. The Horde Project comprises a set of Web-based productivity, messaging, and project-management applications. The Horde Framework is a common code-base used by Horde applications, including libraries and a common user interface.

This should be a great discussion, after which we will move on to a local eating/drinking establishment of the group's choice. Should be fun!

For more information, see http://www.horde.org/...
item.name: Boston PHP Meetup May Meetup
